Documentation for d1_libclient_python - A DataONE Client for Python¶

d1_libclient_python is a DataONE client library written in Python. It provides programmatic access to the DataONE infrastructure and may be used to form the basis of larger applications, or be used to extend existing applications to utilize the services of DataONE.

d1_libclient_python is a part of the DataONE Investigator Toolkit (ITK), and is developed as part of the DataONE project.
